DOC.brief_summary: A study of Montelukast compared to placebo in asthmatic children aged 6-24 months.
DOC.brief_title: Montelukast in Pediatric Patients Aged 6 to 24 Months With Asthma--Safety Study (0476-176)
DOC.criteria: Patient is in good, stable health Patient has been fed solid foods for at least 1 month Patients had at least 3 episodes of asthma or asthmalike symptoms, all occurring after 8 weeks of age; at least one within 6 months of the Prestudy Visit Patients had to be in need of a controller therapy according to criteria established in the Global Initiative for Asthma (GINA) guidelines Patient was hospitalized at the start of the study or required a visit to the emergency room due to asthma with in past 2 weeks
